title: Fragment, 1967-20-18, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton, metal strips
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) in a plain weave foundation, extra weft floats of metal strips cover alternate shots of foundation weft
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 80 x 52 cm (31 1/2 x 20 1/2 in.)
description: Cut and uncut velvet with small group of three flowers enclosed in an elaborately decorated ogee lattice. Warp pile colors are dark green, red, light blue, yellow and ivory on a yellow and gold background.
